title: Apollo 10: around the moon
creator_credit: United States. National Aeronautics Space Administration
brief_description: The film shows various footage of Apollo 10’s travel around the moon including: the Command module filmed from the Lunar module; the far side of the moon; Command module over landing site No. 2; view from Lunar module sixty miles up; inside the Lunar module; Lunar module descent and much more.
